entry.title: Sunday: Rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain beginning this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023
